identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for this camera preset. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace.

inherit_from.title: Camera Inheritor
inherit_from.description: Inherits the properties of the specified camera preset.

listener.title: Listener
listener.description: Specify 'camera' or 'player' to control whether the camera or player is used for audio listening position when this preset is active.

player_effects.title: Player Effects
player_effects.description: Specify whether to allow effects on the player to affect how the game renders when this preset is active.

pos_x.title: X Position
pos_x.description: Set an X position for this camera's behavior.

pos_y.title: Y Position
pos_y.description: Set a Y position for this camera's behavior.

pos_z.title: Z Position
pos_z.description: Set a Z position for this camera's behavior.

rot_x.title: X Rotation
rot_x.description: Set an X rotation for this camera's behavior.

rot_y.title: Y Rotation
rot_y.description: Set a Y rotation for this camera's behavior.
